services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide services in modern ophthalmology using the latest technologies and methods.

excimer.name: Excimer Laser
excimer.description: Laser surgery to get rid of glasses and contact lenses. Used for correction of nearsightedness, farsightedness and astigmatism.

cataract.name: Cataract
cataract.description: Replacement of the eye lens. With cataracts, the lens becomes cloudy and vision deteriorates. During surgery, the old lens is removed and a new one is implanted.

pteregium.name: Pterygium
pteregium.description: Removal of tissue formed on the white of the eye. This surgery is for removing excess tissue formed on the white part of the eye and cornea.

phacic.name: Phacic Lens
phacic.description: Used to implant an artificial lens in the eye for high degrees of vision impairment.

cesplik.name: Strabismus Surgery
cesplik.description: Correction of eye muscles. For solving the problem of misaligned eyes.

cross_linking.name: Cross Linking (CCL)
cross_linking.description: Corneal strengthening. Used to strengthen the cornea in keratoconus disease.

argon.name: Argon Laser (Green Laser)
argon.description: Laser treatment of the retina. Used for retinal problems, diabetes, tears, etc.

yag.name: YAG Laser
yag.description: Capsule cleaning after cataract surgery. If the capsule becomes cloudy after surgery, it is cleaned with YAG laser.

avastin.name: Avastin
avastin.description: Injection treatment of the eye fundus. Used for wet-type macular degeneration, diabetic retinopathy and other diseases.

glaucoma.name: Glaucoma
glaucoma.description: Diagnosis and treatment of glaucoma. Normalization of intraocular pressure.
